android.opengl
Class GLSurfaceView.GLThread

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      android.opengl.GLSurfaceView.GLThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
Enclosing class:
GLSurfaceView
 class GLSurfaceView.GLThread
extends Thread

A generic GL Thread. Takes care of initializing EGL and GL. Delegates to a Renderer instance to do the actual drawing. Can be configured to render continuously or on request.

public void run()
